parameters.description: The ID of the thread the run and run steps belong to.
parameters.name: thread_id

parameters.description: The ID of the run the run steps belong to.
parameters.name: run_id

parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 20.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Sort order by the `created_at` timestamp of the objects. `asc` for ascending order and `desc` for descending order.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include after=obj_foo in order to fetch the next page of the list.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include before=obj_foo in order to fetch the previous page of the list.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description:
A list of additional fields to include in the response. Currently the only supported value is `step_details.tool_calls[*].file_search.results[*].content` to fetch the file search result content.

See the [file search tool documentation](/docs/assistants/tools/file-search#customizing-file-search-settings) for more information.
parameters.name: include[]

summary: Returns a list of run steps belonging to a run.

RunStepObject.description: Represents a step in execution of a run.

assistant_id.description: The ID of the [assistant](/docs/api-reference/assistants) associated with the run step.

anyOf.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the run step was cancelled.
The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the run step completed.

created_at.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the run step was created.

anyOf.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the run step expired. A step is considered expired if the parent run is expired.
The Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the run step failed.

id.description: The identifier of the run step, which can be referenced in API endpoints.

anyOf.description: The last error associated with this run step. Will be `null` if there are no errors.

message.description: A human-readable description of the error.

object.description: The object type, which is always `thread.run.step`.

run_id.description: The ID of the [run](/docs/api-reference/runs) that this run step is a part of.

status.description: The status of the run step, which can be either `in_progress`, `cancelled`, `failed`, `completed`, or `expired`.

step_details.description: The details of the run step.

thread_id.description: The ID of the [thread](/docs/api-reference/threads) that was run.

type.description: The type of run step, which can be either `message_creation` or `tool_calls`.

RunStepObject.title: Run steps

anyOf.description:
Set of 16 key-value pairs that can be attached to an object. This can be
useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured
format, and querying for objects via API or the dashboard.

Keys are strings with a maximum length of 64 characters. Values are strings
with a maximum length of 512 characters.

RunStepDetailsMessageCreationObject.description: Details of the message creation by the run step.

message_id.description: The ID of the message that was created by this run step.

RunStepDetailsMessageCreationObject.title: Message creation

tool_calls.description: An array of tool calls the run step was involved in. These can be associated with one of three types of tools: `code_interpreter`, `file_search`, or `function`.

anyOf.description: Usage statistics related to the run step. This value will be `null` while the run step's status is `in_progress`.

completion_tokens.description: Number of completion tokens used over the course of the run step.

prompt_tokens.description: Number of prompt tokens used over the course of the run step.

total_tokens.description: Total number of tokens used (prompt + completion).

RunStepDetailsToolCallsCodeObject.description: Details of the Code Interpreter tool call the run step was involved in.

code_interpreter.description: The Code Interpreter tool call definition.

input.description: The input to the Code Interpreter tool call.

outputs.description: The outputs from the Code Interpreter tool call. Code Interpreter can output one or more items, including text (`logs`) or images (`image`). Each of these are represented by a different object type.

id.description: The ID of the tool call.

type.description: The type of tool call. This is always going to be `code_interpreter` for this type of tool call.

RunStepDetailsToolCallsCodeObject.title: Code Interpreter tool call

file_search.description: For now, this is always going to be an empty object.

results.description: The results of the file search.

id.description: The ID of the tool call object.

type.description: The type of tool call. This is always going to be `file_search` for this type of tool call.

function.description: The definition of the function that was called.

arguments.description: The arguments passed to the function.

anyOf.description: The output of the function. This will be `null` if the outputs have not been [submitted](/docs/api-reference/runs/submitToolOutputs) yet.

id.description: The ID of the tool call object.

type.description: The type of tool call. This is always going to be `function` for this type of tool call.

RunStepDetailsToolCallsCodeOutputLogsObj.description: Text output from the Code Interpreter tool call as part of a run step.

logs.description: The text output from the Code Interpreter tool call.

RunStepDetailsToolCallsCodeOutputLogsObj.title: Code Interpreter log output

RunStepDetailsToolCallsFileSearchRanking.description: The ranking options for the file search.

score_threshold.description: The score threshold for the file search. All values must be a floating point number between 0 and 1.

RunStepDetailsToolCallsFileSearchRanking.title: File search tool call ranking options

RunStepDetailsToolCallsFileSearchResultO.description: A result instance of the file search.

content.description: The content of the result that was found. The content is only included if requested via the include query parameter.

text.description: The text content of the file.

file_id.description: The ID of the file that result was found in.

file_name.description: The name of the file that result was found in.

score.description: The score of the result. All values must be a floating point number between 0 and 1.

RunStepDetailsToolCallsFileSearchResultO.title: File search tool call result

FileSearchRanker.description: The ranker to use for the file search. If not specified will use the `auto` ranker.
